title: The Triangle E1 - The Gathering Storm
description:
A team of experts must work together to stop disaster in the Bermuda Triangle. 

Episode written by Dan Koboldt.

For more shows like this, visit Realm.fm, and sign up for our newsletter while you're there!

Adrenaline: The Triangle is a Realm production. Listen away.
